General.Name: Orecorp Ltd
General.Description: OreCorp Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a mineral exploration company in Australia. The company explores for gold, nickel, copper, cobalt, and precious metals. OreCorp Limited was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Subiaco, Australia.

0.Name: Mr. Matthew Giles Yates B.Sc. (Hons.), MAIG
0.Title: Exec. Chairman
